snippet.title: Fear & Hunger: Termina - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The sequel to the Fear & Hunger is in development. Pretty big change from the medieval horror, now jumping to the year 1942 with a more modern take on the same macabre horror the first game is known for. A demo is on the way too. You can expect it later this year. Meanwhile, please do check out the first game is you're not familiar with it already!

Links to the first Fear & Hunger:
https://mirohaver.itch.io/fear-hunger
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1002300/Fear__Hunger/

Link to the discord channel:
https://discord.gg/xaEEdfn
